adrFormatAddress: 385 1st Ave. #10g, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Just an FYI to all – selling miles is technically against airline policy. However I have done it a few times with different brokers and never had a problem, so long as your broker is professional. I called the points king to make sure I could hear a human on the other side of the phone, just to give me safety and security so that im not dealing with a bunch of amateurs. They walked me through the process, and I felt good about it. We agreed to terms, and I got my cash, and they used my miles. All in all solid deal.

originalText.text: I had about 200,000 Amex points just sitting in my account, so I looked for a broker to buy them. I randomly found The Points King through Google search, and filled out a form. I got a great cash offer and in about 20 minutes I was able to transfer the points in return for cash. THANK YOU to The Points King for taking my Amex reward points off my hands and giving me cash in return !

originalText.text: I was looking for a secure miles broker and found the points king on google. This was my first time but i felt the process was secure (i even called them up and they walked me through the process). Will definitely use next time, once i rack up some more citi points :)

originalText.text: Was a great pleasure working w/ the points king! I had 50k delta skymiles that i just sold - the whole process was fast and easy - top notch communication. Will be a repeat!!!

originalText.text: I was sitting on a few hundred k amex points collecting dust. Didn’t want to redeam anything, so I used this company for a quote and sold them for cash. Didn’t know u could do this, but im not complaining ; ))
